statements: DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE humidity >= 60 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND temperature > 25.0;
DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE humidity <= 60.0 AND temperature < 20.0;
DELETE FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE reading_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Compost_Status WHERE status = 'completed';
DELETE FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE reading_id = 100 AND temperature > 20.5;
DELETE FROM Compost_Status WHERE compost_temperature < 30.0 AND status = 'Full';
DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM ProcessMonitoring WHERE status = 'error';
DELETE FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature < 0.0 AND timestamp < '2022-08-01';
DELETE FROM ProcessMonitoring WHERE bin_id = 10 AND status = 'aborted';
DELETE FROM composting_site WHERE site_id = 1;
DELETE FROM temperature_sensor WHERE sensor_id = 3;
DELETE FROM temperature_reading WHERE reading_time < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM composting_process WHERE site_id = 5 AND completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE id = 1;
DELETE FROM Composting_Bins WHERE active = FALSE;
DELETE FROM Composting_Bins WHERE bin_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE location = 'Greenhouse' AND temperature > 30;
